page.title: 12Warsop Schools.
page.content: At the beginning of the century there were two schools in Warsop.These buildings now house a car showroom,and a supermarket.There are 4 schools in Warsop at present. { 1.}Hetts Lane Infants'(opened 1904). Modern nursery unit adjoining. Age range 3_7years. { 2.}Birklands Primary (opened 1913). Integral nursery unit. Age range 3_11years. { 3.}Sherwood Junior (opened 1925). Age range 7_11years. { 4.}Meden Comprehensive (opened 1965). Age range 11_18years. The 3 primary schools are brick built but the comprehensive is a modern structure,pleasantly situated with many varied facilities such as the sports complex and craft rooms which are used by the general public in evening classes.
